title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: A hiatus from buzzing around permits you to regroup and recover your energy for bigger and better things. However, it might be initially difficult to claim the quiet time you want now. In the meantime, appreciate whatever space you can create to reflect and search your soul as the New Moon in Libra emphasizes your 12th House of Seclusion. Reminding yourself that peace of mind is found more within than without is a precious gift to bestow to yourself. No one else can endow you with this blessing; and no one can take your tranquility away from you, unless you choose to let them. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
